title: BMW Road Map Europe 2009-1 Professional inc European Speed Cams
description:
BMW 2009-1 Road Map Europe Professional DVD inc European Speed Cameras


Due to problems with dual layer burning for some users, all language folders have been removed from the disc image, OTHER THAN ENGLISH.
This allows the image to fit onto a single-layer DVD+R / DVD+RW.
The navigation language folder will automatically default to ENGLISH, whichever European vehicle the disc is used in.


This contains the European Speed Camera Database (NOV08).


Suitable for iDrive with SatNavPro:
E81, E82, E87, E88, E9x, E60, E61, E63, E64, E70 & E71

NOT SUITABLE FOR: MK4 DVD & Business Nav



The speed camera POIs are available for ALL languages:

ENG, FRE, GER, ITA & SPA


Forced Default language: ENG


Countries included:

AD,AT,BE,BY,CH,CZ,DE,DK,EE,ES,FI,FR,GB,GI,GR,HR,HU,IE,IT,LI,LT,LU,LV,MC,NL,NO,PL,PT,RU,SE,SI,SK,SM,U A,VA


-Improved routes
-Still NO full postcode search.. :(
-Improved POI sub-category searching
eg hotel parking availability, type of restaurants


1 Download torrent & please SEED
2 Burn iso image with NERO etc onto blank DVD+R / DVD+RW
  Finalise disc, if option available
  Tested ok with Verbatim, TDK & Sony DVD+R / DVD+RW x2, x4 & x8
3 Stick disc in car DVD slot
4 Follow iDrive instructions & re-start car after 5 minutes
5 Choose Euro Speed Cams in CAR category of POIs


Merry Christmas!
